it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui

Class FileOpener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JFileChooser
            • it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui.FileOpener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class FileOpener
extends javax.swing.JFileChooser
    CLASS FOR INSTANTIATION AND MANAGEMENT OF FILE SELECTION OBJECT
    - Supports text capture from .txt files
    - Supports capturing images from files
    - Supports deserialization of objects from .dat files
    Version:
    1.0.0.2
    Author:
    GD Applicazioni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
